original_text: The Lord marches out to battle, like a brave soldier. He is angry with his enemies, and he is ready to attack them. He shouts loudly as he attacks, and he shows his power over them. The Lord marches out to battle, like a brave soldier. He is angry with his enemies, and he is ready to attack them. He shouts loudly as he attacks, and he shows his power over them. The Lord marches out to battle,
korean_text: 여호와께서 용사 같이 나가시며 전사 같이 분발하여 외쳐 크게 부르시며 그 대적을 크게 치시리로다

sentences.original_text: The Lord marches out to battle
He is angry with his enemies
and he is ready to attack them
He shouts loudly as he attacks
and he shows his power over them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들에 대한 자신의 권능을 보이신다
